website_summaries.verdict: Skylanders: Trap Team is a return to a simpler form, with new elements that prove the franchise is definitely around for the long haul.
pros: An excellent tablet port of full game with trap mechanisms bringing something new to the established game for old fans
cons: Locked areas can only be accessed by purchasing the correct premium toy, and it's yet another portal to gather dust on the shelf in the future

customer_reviews.title: The Tablet Game (Software) Itself Is No Longer Available From Activision!
customer_reviews.text: Activision have dropped support for their Skylanders mobile games (since end of 2017?), so they are no longer offered/downloadable. Search for "Trap Team App no longer on Play Store" and you will find this on Activision's site. These tablet starter packs are completely useless and should not be sold anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Maggie Bush

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy unless you know for sure what you are getting into
customer_reviews.text: Good for someone who does not have XBox or PlayStation or Wii. Very portable, you can play anywhere. Recommend to install full version. The only drawback is that the game will cost you a lot of money later, buying more figures and traps to continue with the game. Occasional crashes on Ipad mini 2. My son loves the game, but it is getting too expensive. I use this as a way to give him reward for good school work. Some of the figures I have to hunt down to get, and the prices are not uniform. For Light and Dark trap, be sure to buy the expansion packs.
customer_reviews.author: N. Dao

customer_reviews.title: Yay!  Happy Kid and Mom!
customer_reviews.text: I paid full price for this, and it worked right out of the box. I'm not very tech savvy, just followed the simple instructions and it's working. I have an older, refurbished Ipad. I had to delete almost all my other apps to have enough room to use this, but it's worth it. My son has been asking for the Skylanders game for a long time, had read all the books, watched the shows, etc. We don't have any type of video game system, and I really didn't want to spend hundreds of dollars on one. For this price, I have a very happy kids playing Skylanders, I am very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: harmonyszoo

customer_reviews.title: but it's often enough to seriously diminish the enjoyment of the game experience
customer_reviews.text: Just gave this to my son yesterday and have had issues with it from the get-go. He enjoys the game, but it's really frustrating that it doesn't work properly. There are areas where you need to use a character with a specific element in order to get through. For some of these areas, it still won't let him through when he is using the correct element character. It also will tell him he needs a specific trap and when he puts that trap in it doesn't work.. this isn't all the time, but it's often enough to seriously diminish the enjoyment of the game experience.
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: if not "on the go" it would be nice to have the option of plugging up to an ...
customer_reviews.text: The battery usage on this portal is really high. My only complaint is I wish it came with the ability to plug up to an adapter as well, but that kind of defeats the purpose of "on the go". Still, if not "on the go" it would be nice to have the option of plugging up to an adapter considering this portal uses so much energy that constant battery replacement is necessary with just a few hours of game play. A trip to Salt Lake City, UT from Las Vegas, NV wouldn't last on one set of batteries, at least not for the portal. The controller has lasted on the original batteries that came with pack.
customer_reviews.author: Mom of 6

customer_reviews.title: Alternate title “Skylanders: Anger & Frustration”
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY!!They should take this off the market. Long story short - EA shut down the servers for this game. It will not work! Do not pay any amount of money for this, because in the end all you’ll get is tears and disappointment from your kids, because they can’t play it, and frustration and anger that you spent money and time to get a useless game only to box it back up and return it.
customer_reviews.author: Todd Gray

customer_reviews.title: Activision pushing the limits with a full version game on Tablets!
customer_reviews.text: Full version game on the go? Yes please!!! Our son loves the Trap Team game and we were excited to learn we could take the game on the go for long plane or car trips! It works perfectly on an Ipad mini 3. Response is great on it. We have a 128g so memory was never an issue. We tried loading this on our sons Kindle but he only had an 8g and it was too big a file to put it on plus all his favorite apps, but it wasn't an issue since we had the Ipad
customer_reviews.author: Amanda G.

customer_reviews.title: Fun, and easily transportable.
customer_reviews.text: This is so fun! My son is really into the whole Skylanders franchise, and I saw this go on sale around Christmas time, then there was a coupon... I ended up getting it for $25!!! I sooo had to get it for him! It's great, since it's for his ipad, he can take it with him when he goes places that doesn't have a wii (what all his other skylanders games play on), like his grandpa's house. This was a neat idea, and I hope more games decide to offer this iOS option.
customer_reviews.author: A. Alloy-McFarlin

customer_reviews.title: Great toy, dos not work with iPad 1
customer_reviews.text: The only reason I give it 4 stars is that it does not have a recharge option. It runs through batteries quickly, and removing rechargeable batteries to get them charged and put back is a hassle. A charging port would be helpful. Otherwise, great toy, my son can't get enough. It should be noted that this toy does not work with iPad 1. You have to have iPad 2 at least, to be compatible. So, if your iPad has a long charging port - it will not work.
customer_reviews.author: EugeneNJ

customer_reviews.title: Not so happy kid, Not so happy mom
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, I have to edit this review! There is an incompatibility issue with Skylander's Trap Team and iOS9.2. The game keeps crashing. Also, the stated compatibility of Trap Team with ipad2 is false. So now I have a very disappointed son! To make matters worse, this issue as been around for awhile. It is too bad for the kids, and makes this parent hesitant to spend more money with Skylanders.
customer_reviews.author: P. L.

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work! Don’t waste your money or
customer_reviews.text: This came in the package it looked brad new. However, after spending at Least an hour trying to get it downloaded I found out that this game is no longer usable. Do not buy this unless you just want it as a collectible.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley wood

customer_reviews.title: App not available... disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I did not know that the app was no longer available. The game seems to “work” as it does turn on. Unfortunately it is completely worthless since I was not informed that the app needed has been discontinued.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Mommy

customer_reviews.title: very late
customer_reviews.text: this is a late review, I bought it a while back for my son. He used it and loved it, but grown out of it.
customer_reviews.author: Damaris Morales

customer_reviews.title: now I have wasted money on the portal AND a new device
customer_reviews.text: I HAVE NOT BEEN ABLE TO USE THIS AT ALL. I have tried to download the app for this multiple times, and on multiple devices. I keep getting an error message telling me that my device is not compatible. I even bought the device that was listed as being an acceptable device for the software. WTF, now I have wasted money on the portal AND a new device, and still no game for the kids.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Thanks for ruining a 6years olds bday
customer_reviews.text: Not compatible with the kindle models listed! Contacted activision about compatibility, after waiting days and days the response we got was oh..well we listed the devices it was compatible with. So much bulls*** and wasted funds. His tablet is very clearly listed in all websites we checked before buying this game. We are moving to Japan and this was for the trip. Major let down!
customer_reviews.author: LaKeisha

customer_reviews.title: Battery Life's a Drain
customer_reviews.text: My son sure loved getting this for his Fire hd 6 on his birthday. The biggest issue is the battery life. He gets an hour or two before needing to replace the batteries -- that means five AAA batteries ( 3 in the portal and 2 in the controller). The cost of the portal and remote is affordable initially, but it becomes pricey having to change the batteries every day.
customer_reviews.author: Prime Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome but...
customer_reviews.text: im giving four stars because the portal really didn't work but the times it did work the game was awesome! just like the regular skylanders for a console like playstation. graphics are the same as the console. really sharp and nice. I just wish the portal worked so I could've played it more than a couple times without having to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Frenchyblu

customer_reviews.title: Useless!!!!! Do Not Buy!!!
customer_reviews.text: Why on earth would you be selling something that can’t be used?!? I bought this as a Christmas gift for my son!!! And it’s useless and he is upset!! The app you need to download to actually Play this was discontinued in 2017!!!!! You need to give me a refund!!!
customer_reviews.author: Angela Vaughn

customer_reviews.title: Completely Useless
customer_reviews.text: This is a complete waste of money. It’s a starter pack for an iPad game which tells you when it arrives to download the app which is NO LONGER available to download. So it’s WORTHLESS!!! My son excitedly counted down the days until this arrived only to be completely disappointed that it can’t be used for anything. How can this even be sold?????
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Like a Pixar movie - great for boys and girls, men and women.
customer_reviews.text: This is marketed as a boys game, but it's really for everyone, like a good pixar movie. Lots of puzzles and mini-games and variety and you can evolve your characters (which have great physical toys that work in the game wirelessly). The new tablet version has to be the ultimate road-trip game. The wireless game controller stores away inside the portal. Very cool! My only criticism - the portal should use AA instead of AAA batteries, because I have some Skylanders that light up as they get near the portal ("Lightcore"), and that drains the portal batteries a little quicker.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Portable and Good for Non-Gaming System Households
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son because he wanted to start playing Skylanders and I didn't want to purchase a gaming system for him to be able to do so. (We ended up purchasing a Wii U a month later, by the way) This is a great alternative if you don't want to purchase a gaming system or want a portable way to play the game on the iPad. But if you think you're going to purchase a gaming system at some point I would probably just avoid purchasing this set.
customer_reviews.author: A W

customer_reviews.title: Happy!
customer_reviews.text: Very happy. This was a gift for my 6 year old grandson and he is extremely happy. I was hesitant as it said it was either used or in a damaged box and it was neither. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Just Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Amazon LIES and says its compatible - you'll waste money and time realizing it's NOT
customer_reviews.text: So disappointing; this isn't even compatible with my Kindle Kids Edition 7". The warnings about compatability from other dissapointed users are accurate, but I am not sure how a buyer could even make a good decision since they lie and say it IS compatible. The end result if a very dissapointed child.
customer_reviews.author: H. Cheeley

customer_reviews.title: App no longer exists.  Do not buy.
customer_reviews.text: Amazon needs to stop selling this product. The app no longer exists for this game. The portal and accessories we bought are now useless.
customer_reviews.author: eb

customer_reviews.title: and it was an amazing price. Great buy for little ones for Christmas
customer_reviews.text: Quick shipping, product as described. My son loves skylanders so much that we ended up purchasing this for him (even though he has it and the other games on xbox.) With this though he can play anywear that we take the ipad, the characters of course work on this that are from all of the other games, and it was an amazing price. Great buy for little ones for Christmas!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Love Sklyanders but not on this platform.
customer_reviews.text: We bought this as a combo with a kindle fire for our 9 year old. I think it frustrated her more than anything. Thankfully, her grandmother bought it for her Xbox as well. She never plays with this one as it had connection problems constantly. We love the Skylander products but this one was a miss.
customer_reviews.author: M. Ward

customer_reviews.title: Works GREAT on a Kindle HD6!
customer_reviews.text: What a great buy for my son! This allows him to play Skylanders on long road trips, which is great. It is EXACTLY like playing the game on a console. There is nothing missing. So if your tablet supports it, grab it for your kid. They'll love it, and it's always an incredible bargain here on Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: Jim Waid

customer_reviews.title: Great price and quality game
customer_reviews.text: My grandson loves this game! He plays on his kindle fire hdx7. Easy to set up the portal after you have downloaded the game. Just make sure you have Bluetooth enabled on your kindle press and hold the button on the portal and it searches and finds the Bluetooth device. The portal is wireless and all of the parts are good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: Not compatible for iPad 2
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited when this arrived!!! It was such a good buy and my kids were so excited! We got everything out and ready, downloaded the app, and then tried to play it-to find out this will not support the iPad 2. An oversight on my part? Product was sent in time, and in perfect condition.
customer_reviews.author: RSinIDAHO

customer_reviews.title: Trash
customer_reviews.text: Box was damaged, dings in the portal. Looks like I got a refurb product.
customer_reviews.author: E.Wiley

customer_reviews.title: Kids love it, Battery drainage too fast.
customer_reviews.text: My kid loves it. I would get 5 stars based on his loving it, but unfortunately the batteries (no matter the brand), do not last long in the base. The base drains batteries like no one's business. fix that and this would get 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Great for any skylanders fan!
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this. Great price. He has skylanders Giants for wii u & Swap Force for Xbox 360 & likes this one just as much. I'm very happy with my purchase & have no issues so far. I love they it for tablets. I recommend this to any skylanders fan. You won't be disappointed with your purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Bobbie N.

customer_reviews.title: Fun, but they need to do something about the portal power
customer_reviews.text: My 9 year old son loves this. It works great with his ipad mini. HOWEVER - they absolutely should have made it possible to plug the portal in, instead of just based on battery power. He is going through batteries like crazy. Very frustrating.
customer_reviews.author: Alisa Terry

customer_reviews.title: Product is labeled as being able to work with other ...
customer_reviews.text: Product is labeled as being able to work with other tablets as long as they meet the specifications. I am a techie and confirmed that my childs current tablet met the specificatiosn needed and it still did not work. 3 stars because I'm sure it works with the two main tablets.
customer_reviews.author: KrisAlaina

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work with ipad
customer_reviews.text: No we had to return. Would not work with iPad.
customer_reviews.author: susanjh

customer_reviews.title: I have no idea if the game is good.
customer_reviews.text: My son ordered this, not seeing the tiny data bit about only the newest pads will play it. Some day, if he upgrades, he hopes to play it. I tried some of the PC emulators, for android, to no avail. I have no idea if the game is good.
customer_reviews.author: Pat Orsban

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2 for my little brother and sister for their new iPad minis. This product costs 60$ at a local GameStop and only $25 on amazon. Comes with everything you need to get started, even the 5 AAA batteries needed to operate the portal and controller. Make sure you have 3 GB of available storage or you will not be able to download
customer_reviews.author: Dallas Artis

customer_reviews.title: I was Disappointed and My Son Nicolas crushed
customer_reviews.text: The tablet version of the skylander trap team kit worked perfectly on MY samsung Tablet. Unfortunately, my son Nicolas's kindle fire was not abled. When I went to download from the Amazon Apps and games. The app said it was currently unabailable. Ugh!! I should have checked first and not take it as if all tablets are comoatible So upset that the two did not work out. I use my tablet for writing and other tasks. My son had to yse it to try out his Birthday gift.
customer_reviews.author: Priscilla Andrade

customer_reviews.title: Eats batteries like mad and uses AAA's not to mention the memory ...
customer_reviews.text: Eats batteries like mad and uses AAA's not to mention the memory that it takes up on the kindle. Other than that it works well just make sure there are enough batteries in the house to keep the kids happy.
customer_reviews.author: a old fashion parent

customer_reviews.title: the figures and traps are the same that come with the actual game for a console like Xbox, and there are too many in circulation
customer_reviews.text: Check carefully what product you plan to use this on. We were under the impression that it would work on Kindle, tablets, ios, ect. The only tablets it will work on cost over $250; Kindle must be a 6 or 7 edition; iphone 6 did not work. The only device we got it to work on was a galaxy mobile phone, and we did not want to go that route. Also, the figures and traps are the same that come with the actual game for a console like Xbox, and there are too many in circulation to sell them off. My son wanted this for months and is now very disappointed, as are we.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Lookabill

customer_reviews.title: Great game!
customer_reviews.text: It took me a little bit to figure out how to get the characters to download into the game (I had to restart my tablet to get it to work) but once they downloaded, my 7 year old son had so much fun playing!!! It takes up 2GB of memory and takes over an hour to download but is definitely a great game!
customer_reviews.author: Jenny Noworyta

customer_reviews.title: Fun and Challenging!
customer_reviews.text: Fun and Challenging! Turns your tablet into the ultimate portable gaming system! Graphics are amazing. We use it on the Samsung Galaxy Pro 12.2 inch and 8.4 inch but others have said it works fine with the Galaxy Tab 4.
customer_reviews.author: techishmom

customer_reviews.title: needs much help to set up
customer_reviews.text: bought this for my grandson, his father will have to set it up. my grandson was so excited when he saw it, but it's almost new years and he still hasn't been able to play it. it seems its going to take a while to set it up for his kindle.
customer_reviews.author: C.Blanton

customer_reviews.title: Works on few tablets.
customer_reviews.text: Works on very few tablets & compatibility lists are different on different sites. The tablet we have, that it actually works on, appears to run well, but I recommend you try downloading the app BEFORE purchasing this version.
customer_reviews.author: azcoolmom

customer_reviews.title: Skylanders for tablet
customer_reviews.text: Excellent when we bought it is was the perfect thing for my grandson and we passed it down to another younger child !! lots of fun
customer_reviews.author: Lynn A

customer_reviews.title: App not available
customer_reviews.text: This product does not work as the app is no longer available. Only allows you to play level one. Anything beyond that is not accessible because they have removed the online platform. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Smith

customer_reviews.title: Fun for Kids
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for NVIDIA Shield tablet. Work great, no issues with connection. Recognizes characters and controller very quickly. My son loves this game and plays it until the tablet runs out of batteries every chance he gets.
customer_reviews.author: JFloyd

customer_reviews.title: RIDICULOUS
customer_reviews.text: Why in the world would you sell this product? You can’t even get the app anymore. Absolutely a ridiculous waste of time and money.
customer_reviews.author: Katelyn

customer_reviews.title: We were very disappointed would not work on any electronic device that we ...
customer_reviews.text: We were very disappointed would not work on any electronic device that we owned. Apparently you have to have the newest version in order to play this on any device
customer_reviews.author: Amber vancannon

customer_reviews.title: Great for the iPad
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for our son to use with his iPad when he can't play on the Xbox One. Love how easy it is for him to use and that it has a controller. It does seem to use batteries fairly quick so we invested in some rechargable ones.
customer_reviews.author: YoungerFamilyFun

customer_reviews.title: A must have!!
customer_reviews.text: My Grandson now has a Skylanders game he can play when he is visiting with me, thanks to the Skylanders Trap Team Tablet Pack. The set-up was easy and my Grandson has enjoyed many hours playing with the mobile device.
customer_reviews.author: AM

customer_reviews.title: Don’t trust product in box!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Can I give a zero stars. Iordered starter set for Ipad and got it for the Wii and it had a goodwill sticker on it. Pretty irritated. Horrible!!!
customer_reviews.author: pharmgirl81

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY!! WILL NOT WORK!!
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY!! THIS ITEM NO LONGER WORKS AND IT IS NOT SUPPORTED OR UPDATED FROM THE MANUFACTURER!! IT WILL NOT WORK ON ANY TABLET!!
customer_reviews.author: Saxo1968

customer_reviews.title: Prefer the Wii U version
customer_reviews.text: This is okay...my son prefers the Wii U version as this lagged on our ipad mini. Plus it is expensive to have to buy another controller that actually will sync with it so you can have two players.
customer_reviews.author: db1895

customer_reviews.title: very fun game. the kids like the fact that they ...
customer_reviews.text: very fun game. the kids like the fact that they can use mom and dads tablet and bring their skylanders to play wherever they want. drawback for us is that the portal and controllers eat batteries like crazy.
customer_reviews.author: R. Hamilton

customer_reviews.title: WILL NOT WORK WITH IPAD MINI UNLESS ITS THE NEWEST RETINA DISPLAY!!!!
customer_reviews.text: great product!!!! PLEASE NOTE!!!!! THIS WILL NOT!!!!! WORK WITH IPAD MINI UNLESS ITS THE NEWEST VERSION IPAD MINI WITH RETINA DISPLAY ONLY!!!!!! also IPAD 2 will not work needs to have the latest BLUETOOTH 4.0 so please save time if need be.
customer_reviews.author: Disneyfam3

customer_reviews.title: This is completely compatible with iPad mini first gen.
customer_reviews.text: This does work for first gen iPad mini. Wasn't sure cause the box says no and the test on the manufacturer site said not compatible but their notes on site said yes. We bought it to try and it works flawless.
customer_reviews.author: Fellpuppet

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: Great buying experience threw amazon as always. However, the tablets this system works with is very limited and I did not realize that. Be sure to check which tablet you have not just the OS version!
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Hromada

customer_reviews.title: No app anymore
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to give this to my son for Christmas. It was quite disappointing when we found out the app for this doesn't exist anymore. Not sure why it's even available to buy anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Jodi G

customer_reviews.title: Best Purchase this year
customer_reviews.text: Works PERFECTLY with my sons iPad - the battery life on the portal isn't as great as I would like, but my son also plays 5-6 hours a day. I ended up purchasing rechargeable batteries in order to save a little money.
customer_reviews.author: Aunesty Reikofski (I Leave Reviews - email in profile)

customer_reviews.title: Horrible experience. My son just opened this for Xmas ...
customer_reviews.text: Horrible experience. My son just opened this for Xmas and can't use it on any device this posting or any of the others on the web show as compatible. So I went to Activision site and they don't show compatibility with anything but apple products. One of which according to their site is my phone. Nope, not available for my phone either regardless of what Activision says.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A life-saver when traveling with 8 year old boy!
customer_reviews.text: My son was over the moon when he got this for Christmas. We were skeptical but the wireless system paired up seamlessly with his iPad. No delay in response as he is gaming. Such a lifesaver when traveling!
customer_reviews.author: M. Carter

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: My son absolutely adored it. It's his first video game. They have no violence they are funny and a joy to play. The only problem is that during Christmas with the new update for iOS the wouldn't work past a certain spot but the y fixed that quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey McAdams

customer_reviews.title: It does drain the batteries fast but it's still nice for kids to play with on the go
customer_reviews.text: My son loves to play with them on his ipad. It's portable so he can take it anywhere. It does drain the batteries fast but it's still nice for kids to play with on the go.
customer_reviews.author: Vtv

customer_reviews.title: Bought two, and they seem to die quickly. ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought two, and they seem to die quickly. Had to replace one because it wouldn't turn back on. Then the replacement stopped working on one of the devices.
customer_reviews.author: LW

customer_reviews.title: My 2 & 4 year old love this. Easily syncs to their ipad and they ...
customer_reviews.text: My 2 & 4 year old love this. Easily syncs to their ipad and they can bring it on the go. Great for trips to grandma's. Would recommend for any skylander lover. Kid and parent alike.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Price

customer_reviews.title: This worked great with my Son's IPAD
customer_reviews.text: This worked great with my Son's IPAD. Both my boys have enjoyed playing it. Great for any kid who has a compatible tablet and loves the Skylander's series/
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome buy! I think it's an awesome convenient way ...
customer_reviews.text: Awesome buy! I think it's an awesome convenient way to play since kids are usually on their tablets and on the go. I gave this one away as a birthday gift. Can't go wrong with Skylanders!
customer_reviews.author: jtran06

customer_reviews.title: Only downside is the portal eats batteries like they are going out of
customer_reviews.text: well worth the 20 bucks. Only downside is the portal eats batteries like they are going out of style
customer_reviews.author: R. Morley

customer_reviews.title: Best game ever
customer_reviews.text: Best game ever. I purchased the wii u version for my son. I then purchased the tablet version for my iPad mini. Lots of fun.
customer_reviews.author: TC

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY TABLET EDITION
customer_reviews.text: The app required to play the tablet edition is no longer supported or available on the App or Goggle Play Store. Do not buy this item.
customer_reviews.author: Bobby Lester

customer_reviews.title: My son used his own money on this and it was so disappointing to learn that he had wasted his money
customer_reviews.text: So incredibly bummed that this is only for iPad generations 3 and newer. My son used his own money on this and it was so disappointing to learn that he had wasted his money.
customer_reviews.author: travis r. paulin

customer_reviews.title: Fun on the go!
customer_reviews.text: Great fun on the go or at home! Can use all sky landers made before this game as well.
customer_reviews.author: Gabrial

customer_reviews.title: Fun game, nothing offensive
customer_reviews.text: My 6 yo son is in heaven. Fun game, nothing offensive, clever names for creatively designed characters. Game lives up to its reviews as well designed and looks GREAT on a tablet. As far as the franchise goes, I like that there is a figurine element to this collection but man I wish they were a little less expensive. Also YOU CAN play non-Trap-Team Skylanders using this portal, which is great. Only down side so far is that I think I am going to have to buy stock in Duracell however since the portal only lasts for 6-8 hours on 3 AAA batteries.
customer_reviews.author: VTDave

customer_reviews.title: My kids love Skylanders and were so excited to see that they ...
customer_reviews.text: My kids love Skylanders and were so excited to see that they could play on the iPad! I've bought a few as gifts as well, always a hit!
customer_reviews.author: NML

customer_reviews.title: READ ALL SPECIFICS ON TABLETS
customer_reviews.text: VERY SPECIFIC ON WHAT TABLETS IT WILL WORK ON. IF IT IS NOT ON THE LIST IT DOES NOT WORK. OTHER THAN THAT IT IS GREAT!!
customer_reviews.author: Kristina

customer_reviews.title: Fun and team building
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for the grandkids and they have played nonstop! It was their favorite birthday gift.
customer_reviews.author: criss02003

customer_reviews.title: My 9 year old loves it.
customer_reviews.text: My 9 year old loves it. We got it for her Kindle Fire and it looks great on there. She LOVES the remote.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah S. Blankenship

customer_reviews.title: Does not work for Kindle fire or IOS
customer_reviews.text: I would have given zero stars if I could. It did not work at all in the tablet, and it broke my son's heart.
customer_reviews.author: Beth Gerstein

customer_reviews.title: My 8 year old grandson really enjoyed receiving this for Christmas
customer_reviews.text: My 8 year old grandson really enjoyed receiving this for Christmas. It was one of many on his list, but ended up in the final draft.
customer_reviews.author: Pat

customer_reviews.title: This would be amazing if it included the game
customer_reviews.text: This would be amazing if it included the game... I bought this for my son's birthday just to find out that we had to purchase the game as well... Very upsetting.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry

customer_reviews.title: Love this system
customer_reviews.text: This is a great set, I love how the controller is stored in the bottom of the system. My son loves making his skylanders come to life.
customer_reviews.author: AB12610

customer_reviews.title: Nice game but draining batteries
customer_reviews.text: Nice, the kids love this, great value for this price especially when traveling BUT draining batteries like crazy
customer_reviews.author: esalomo

customer_reviews.title: Kids Like it
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this for when the TV is occupied. just realize that it does not work on the older IPAD II due to a change in blue tooth technology
customer_reviews.author: John Grafton

customer_reviews.title: Way Cool!
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this kit, and I have to admit that it is way cool! I love the new postal and mini controller that fits into the bottom of the portal.
customer_reviews.author: C. D. Cloyd

customer_reviews.title: Love skylanders!
customer_reviews.text: Tablet edition is exact same as console. Love how the portal holds up the tablet. And how the controller is stored in bottom of portal.
customer_reviews.author: H and E

customer_reviews.title: A fun game to play
customer_reviews.text: Brought this game for my nieces and she loves it. It was easy to setup on iOS. And she hasn't had any issues with it so far.
customer_reviews.author: Cat K

customer_reviews.title: packaging and shipment all great. However
customer_reviews.text: The item, packaging and shipment all great. However, I was not able to use them (I bought 2) because my kids had the pre 2014 Samsung 10.1 tablets. Its very surprising and quite annoying that the game cant be installed on the previous devices. you have to buy a new device to play the game! I ended up buying a PS4 with a Skylanders PS4 starter kit instead of buying two new tablets and gave away the tablets kits I bought as a birthday gifts.
customer_reviews.author: Yaser

customer_reviews.title: My son loves skylanders. We returned this one for ...
customer_reviews.text: My son loves skylanders. We returned this one for the tablet. I decided to buy a Wii U and got the skylanders for it.
customer_reviews.author: kmbere

customer_reviews.title: Skylanders starter pack a good buy
customer_reviews.text: My grandson got this for Christmas and we have adapted it to an I a Pad. He is six and loves playing this game .
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Terrible Experience!
customer_reviews.text: The game that goes with this is no longer available for download, DO NOT PURCHASE!!!
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Rhodes

customer_reviews.title: The batteries provided were all corroded and unusable! Not ...
customer_reviews.text: The batteries provided were all corroded and unusable! Not exactly what your child wants when they want to open the package that they paid for by themselves!
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: whats not to love? I take treatments and this will help pass ...
customer_reviews.text: cheap, fast ship, new in package...whats not to love? I take treatments and this will help pass the time, Thx!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good price, easy setup
customer_reviews.text: My 9 year old had no problem setting this up by himself. He has an iPad mini. I read a few reviews about the system not being compatible with some tablets, that worried me a little. But we had no problems. The price was better than Walmart, Target and Toys R Us. Thanks Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: Janene

customer_reviews.title: An awesome game for a child to have on the go ...
customer_reviews.text: An awesome game for a child to have on the go with their tablet! I bought him the Kindle HD 7 for this game and the graphics look amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Mindy

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Good luck getting it to work with your android device...and mines on the list. Very unhappy kid.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Eberle

customer_reviews.title: POS!  DONT BUY!!!
customer_reviews.text: USELESS!!! My daughter was all excited and tried to install on her tablet and doesn't even have the app for it. POS!!!
customer_reviews.author: Elemental Monkey

customer_reviews.title: Do Not Buy This
customer_reviews.text: I would give zero stars if I could. This game is no longer supported and should not be for sale on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Lydia Stoffers

customer_reviews.title: Skylanders goes wireless!
customer_reviews.text: The iPad version is awesome and quickly connects to the portal and remote. No wires makes it great for playing anywhere you want.
customer_reviews.author: debdebtig

customer_reviews.title: ... the batteries are first put in this toy is awesome. It really needs a power cord for the ...
customer_reviews.text: When the batteries are first put in this toy is awesome. It really needs a power cord for the base unit.
customer_reviews.author: Ray

product_meta.title: Skylanders Trap Team Tablet Starter Pack - iOS, Android, & Fire OS
product_meta.description:
***Note to Kindle Fire customers: Game is supported on 2014 Amazon Fire HD 6” or Fire HD 7” and also supported on 2014 Amazon Fire HDX 8.9. Game is also now supported for the 2013 Kindle Fire HDX 7” and 8.9” with the FireOS 4 update (3GB minimum storage and Wi-Fi Connection required). 
Learn more about FireOS4 Update




SKYLANDERS TRAP TEAM STARTER PACK
 CAPTURE EVIL. UNLEASH GOOD. 
Get the full Skylanders Trap Team console video gameplay experience on your tablet device! Now you can bring the Skylanders to life, defeat villains and trap them wherever you go using the ALL NEW Wireless Traptanium Portal and Wireless Game Controller that comes with the Tablet Starter Pack.

 
Kaos has blown up the walls of the feared Cloudcracker Prison freeing the most notorious villains in Skylands. It’s up to you and the Skylanders to find and capture them. Using Traptanium, a magic material that can harness the power of the Elements, you have the amazing ability to trap the villains and return them to Skylands to fight for you! Begin the ultimate adventure as you explore Skylands in search of the escaped villains!

 TABLET STARTER PACK INCLUDES: 
1-Video Game (Download required - No additional purchase needed) , 1-Wireless Traptanium Portal 1- Wireless Game Controller, 2-Skylanders Figures, 2-Traps, 1-Trap Collection Tray, 1-Character Collector Poster, 2-Sticker Sheets with Secret Codes, 2-Trading Cards and 5 AAA Batteries

DEVICE COMPATIBILITY
 * Kindle Fire HD 6" & 7" (2014), Fire HDX 8.9" (2014), Fire HDX 7" & 8.9" (2013) - Fire OS 4 or Higher
 * iPad 3rd & 4th Generation, iPad Air, iPad Air 2, iPad Mini, iPad Mini 2, iPad Mini 3 - iOS 7 or higher
   
 * Galaxy Note 10.1 (2014), Galaxy Note Pro 12.2, Galaxy Tab Pro (8.4, 10.1, 12.2), Galaxy Tab S (8.4, 10.5) - Android 4.4 or higher
 * Nexus 9 (2014), Nexus 7 (2013) - Android 4.4 or higher
 * Nvidia Shield Tablet - Android 4.4 or higher


 WIRELESS TRAPTANIUM PORTAL 
Place the Skylanders on the NEW Traptanium Portal to bring the Skylanders to life and capture villains in Traps

 WIRELESS GAME CONTROLLER 
Use the included wireless game controller to explore the magical world of Skylands. For ease of storage and portability, the all new wireless Skylanders game controller fits into the base of the Wireless Traptanium Portal. You can also play Skylanders Trap Team using the touch screen

 TRAP MASTER SKYLANDERS 
Trap Master Skylanders are the ultimate trappers with powerful Traptanium weapons

 TRAPS 
Defeat and capture villains in the Traps. Then use the villains to fight for you on the side of good

 ALL NEW SKYLANDERS 
Each Skylander has their own unique abilities and powers

 VIDEO GAME 
Experience the full Skylanders Trap Team game experience of bringing Skylanders to Life, along with trapping and playing as villains on your tablet device. (Download required - No additional purchase necessary)
feature_bullets: Includes: 1-Video Game (Download required - No additional purchase needed), 1-Wireless Traptanium Portal, 1- Wireless Game Controller, 2-Skylanders Figures, 2-Traps, 1-Trap Collection Tray, 1-Character Collector Poster, 2-Sticker Sheets with Secret Codes, 2-Trading Cards, and 5 AAA Batteries
Compatible with Kindle Fire HD 6” & 7” (2014), Kindle Fire HDX 8.9” (2014), and additional devices
Place the Skylanders on the new Traptanium Portal and bring the Skylanders to Life
Trap Master Skylanders are the ultimate trappers with powerful Traptanium Weapons - Defeat and Capture Villains in the Traps and then use the Villains on the side of good
